name: CSS
description: I love using CSS to bring designs to life with smooth animations and clean layouts. It's my go-to for making web apps visually engaging.

name: JavaScript
description: The backbone of interactivity! I enjoy using JavaScript to create dynamic, responsive experiences that make websites feel alive.

name: Figma
description: My favorite tool for designing UI/UX. I use it to prototype ideas quickly and collaborate on sleek, user-friendly designs.

name: Photoshop
description: Great for editing and enhancing images. I use it to create custom graphics, refine visuals, and add creative touches.

name: Illustrator
description: Perfect for vector graphics and logo design. I use it to craft sharp, scalable illustrations and branding elements.

name: Vue
description: I enjoy Vue for its simplicity and flexibility in building reactive web applications with a clean structure.

name: Node.js
description: My choice for backend development. I use Node.js to build fast, scalable server-side applications and APIs.

name: Bootstrap
description: Great for rapid UI development. I use Bootstrap to build responsive, mobile-friendly layouts with ease.

name: Canvas 2D
description: A powerful tool for drawing graphics in the browser. I use it for creative coding and interactive visual elements.

name: Three.js
description: I love using Three.js to create stunning 3D experiences on the web, from interactive animations to immersive environments.
